app.name: Draft Proofreading OpenAI Assist
app.short_description: Use OpenAI's ChatGPT to make and profread your ticket response.
app.long_description:
Draft Proofreading OpenAI Assist is a powerful application leveraging OpenAI's ChatGPT to streamline your customer support workflow.
this app simplifies your support tasks:
1. Draft (Japanese): Generate draft responses in Japanese. Utilize ChatGPT to read the ticket conversation and generate a base response for you.
2. Draft (English): Generate draft responses in English, following the same process as the Japanese draft.
3. Proofread (Japanese): Polish your in-progress Japanese responses. Let ChatGPT review and enhance your draft, updating it to ensure accuracy and effectiveness.
4. Proofread (English): Perform the same proofreading function as above but for English responses.
app.installation_instructions:
Add your OpenAI API key and click install.
To gain access to OpenAI's API,
1. Visit the OpenAI website (https://www.openai.com/) and navigate to the API section
2. Create an OpenAI account if you don't already have one. This may involve providing necessary information
3. Familiarize yourself with the OpenAI Developer Dashboard, which is where you will manage your API access and obtain necessary credentials.
